Description.Text: Finikas offers sea-view accommodation and a pool, set amidst a 4,000-m² garden. All air-conditioned en suite rooms of Hotel Finikas are equipped with free internet access, and have a fridge, satellite TV and safe. They all come with private bathroom with hairdryer. The hotel’s restaurant serves a la carte lunch and dinner. There is also a pool bar, where guests can enjoy a refreshing drink or cocktail. For those looking to unwind, there is a hot tub, a sauna, and a hammam on site. The hotel also has a well-equipped fitness room.

It is located a few-minutes' walk from Alyko and Pyrgaki beaches and close to the white sand dunes. Naxos town is 17 km away, offering shops, nightlife and dining options. Naxos Airport is a 20-minute drive away. Free parking is available on site.
